simplified: 有仇不报非君子，有冤不伸枉为人

pronunciation.pinyin: yǒu chóu bù bào fēi jūn zǐ , yǒu yuān bù shēn wǎng wéi rén
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: you3 chou2 bu4 bao4 fei1 jun1 zi3 , you3 yuan1 bu4 shen1 wang3 wei2 ren2

details.simplified: 有仇不报非君子，有冤不伸枉为人
details.traditional: 有仇不報非君子，有冤不伸枉為人

meanings.value: one who doesn't avenge an injustice is not a gentleman, one who doesn't redress a wrong is not a man
